messages.subject: questions about this list and unschooling.com
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/29/02 1:22:50 PM Central Daylight Time, AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/29/02 1:22:50 PM Central Daylight Time,
AlwaysLearning@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< but just sometimes I get tired of having to defend or provide rationale for
the way we live >>

Me too!! The new people don't realize just how many times you've had to
defend and explain your position and beliefs.
Although I'm really grateful that everyone did it for the 1,000,000 th time
for ME!!!
That's what I remind myself when I get agitated.

Also, don't you find the truly inquisitive, willing to listen types so much
more enjoyable to discuss all this with? Rather than the "know it all
already" types that want to try and point out how you're absolutely not
understanding unschooling because they do it differently?
Ren
